name: Filter Search
overview: Adds search functionality to Jellyfin filter dialogs
description: Adds search functionality to filter dialogs (tags, genres, studios, etc.) and displays enabled/checked filters at the top of the list.

versions.changelog:
For Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Removed active filters bar from movies page
- Search, Select All/None, and sort-enabled-to-top in filter dialog remain

For Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Removed active filters bar from movies page
- Search, Select All/None, and sort-enabled-to-top in filter dialog remain
